Package com.payd.shooti.npc.enemy.enemies.patrolbot

Class GxPatrolBotArm

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.math.Bounds
com.payd.shooti.entities.BoundsEntity
com.payd.shooti.entities.SimpleEntity
com.payd.shooti.npc.enemy.enemies.patrolbot.GxPatrolBotArm
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoundsObject, ICanShader, IDispose, IGameObject, IRender, IUpdate
public class GxPatrolBotArm extends SimpleEntity
Body part of the patrol bot which attaches to the main body and shoots projectiles.
